GK19gp01-11u:1478: [19] yathā-atha sarva-śruti-purāṇādi-kṛta-praśaṃsasya vṛṣṇi-vaṃśasya vataṃsaḥ śrī-devamīḍha-nāmā parama-guṇa-dhāmā madhurāmadhyāsāmāsa /

GK19gp01-11u:1594_1: vṛndāvanaṃ praviśan samāsata eva samasta-śāstra-sāraṃ pṛcchataḥ putrān upadideśa, yathā-

GK19gp01-11u:1619: tat tad aśeṣa-sampattyor api dampatyo rahasi saṃvādo' yaṃ babhūva /

GK19gp01-11u:1627: [51] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaś cintayāmāsa-asya tato' pi madhurataratvaṃ nāyuktam /

GK19gp01-11u:1656: [62] atha tayā vṛtta-sva-citta-vṛtti-prathayā tat-kathayā ślathitavāntaḥ śrī-vraja-dharitrī-kāntaḥ kānta-nijālaṅkāra-vāraṃ sūta-kumārāya vitatāra /

GK19gp01-11u:1661: mayy atisaktau bhaktau kathaṃ nirvidya khidyāthe ?
GK19gp01-11u:1662: yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ śaśvad evānubhavator bhavatoḥ kumāratayā sphurati /
GK19gp01-11u:1663_0: sa tu sadā bhavator evānugataḥ pratikalpaṃ svabhakti-pravartanāya divi mat-pravartita-droṇa-dharā-rūpa-kalāṃśa-kalāvatoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1663_1: tad bhūri bhāgyaṃ ity ādi-rītyā brahmādy-alabhya-sākṣāt-tat-phala-sākṣātkārāya svayam
GK19gp01-11u:1663_2: eva pṛthivyāṃ bhavator bhavator eva bhavaṃ labhata eva æ acirād eva ca rucirā rucireṣā
GK19gp01-11u:1664_0: [65] tad evaṃ śrāvitābhihite tirohite ca paramahite bhagavati labdha-jāgarāv upalabdhāmṛta-sāgarāv
GK19gp01-11u:1664_1: iva ca mithas tad eva saṅkathayantau prathayantau ca parama-camatkāra-nivahaṃ vahataḥ sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1665: [66] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svagataṃ cintayāmāsa-tad evaṃ jātāny eva mama praśnānām uttārāṇi /
GK19gp01-11u:1666_0: tatra ca bhavator eveti yuktam evoktaṃ śrī-bhagavatā--prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij
GK19gp01-11u:1666_1: jātas tavātmajaḥ [10.8.14] iti vadato' py avyabhicāra-vacaḥ-pracāra-sargasya muneḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1667: [67] śrī-bhagavatā saha sambandhaḥ kila kevala-prema-nibandhanaḥ-bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] ity ādeḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1668: atas tad-viśeṣasya tad-viśeṣa eva hetuḥ-ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ādeḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1669: tatas tasmin vatsatāṃ satāṃ vātsalyābhidha eva premā pramāpayati /
GK19gp01-11u:1670: [68] tatra śrī-vasudevasya tad-aiśvaryālocanena vātsalyasya tāralyaṃ sāralyaṃ cāsāditam /
GK19gp01-11u:1671: śrī-vrajarājasya punas tad-vātsalyaṃ śaśvad udbuddhaṃ śuddham eva ca prasiddham /
GK19gp01-11u:1672: pitṛbhyāṃ putratayā tad-dhāraṇe kāraṇaṃ ca munibhir mana eva manyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1674: dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ [BhP 10.2.18] ity ādeś ca /
GK19gp01-11u:1675: śrī-vraja-rājābhyām api manasā dhāraṇaṃ tasya kāryānyathānupapatti-siddhena bhakti-svābhāvyenaiva sambhāvyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1676: tatra ca sati sāmprataṃ tu viśeṣata eva sāmprataṃ parāvasthām anu kṛtāsaktau hi bhaktau tad-udayaḥ syāt /
GK19gp01-11u:1677: tasmāt tavaivātmajas tasya vasudevasya tu kvacit kārye nimitte jātaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1679: [70] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evaṃ paramārter upakaṇṭhatāṃ prāptāyām utkaṇṭhāyām ekadā sarve' narvācīnā vraja-vāsinaḥ sabhāvāḥ sabhāyāṃ militāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1680: militvā ca tad eva sotkaṇṭhaṃ suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1681: [71] tadā ca tatraikā tāpasī kenacana snātakena samam āyātā /
GK19gp01-11u:1682: tāṃ ca mahā-prabhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ lakṣayitvā sarve samutthāyātithyam āvitathyena vidhāya vijñāpayāmāsuḥ-sākṣād bhagavato yogamāyeva kā tvam asi ?
GK19gp01-11u:1684: [72] sā ca sahāsam āha sma-paurṇamāsī-nāmnī kātyāyanī ca kumāra-śramaṇā ca pārikāṅkṣiṇī cekṣaṇikā cāsmi /
GK19gp01-11u:1686: āvāṃ ca vidyā-viśeṣeṇaitad-vayaskāv eva sadā vidyāvahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1687: [73] te ūcuḥ-etāvatī kṛpā kṛpaṇeṣu katham asmāsu kṛtā ?
GK19gp01-11u:1690: [76] sovāca-bhavatāṃ prāṇa-kandasya śrīman-nandasya jagadānandaḥ sa khalu nandanaḥ sambhaviteti /
GK19gp01-11u:1691: [77] sarve sa-bāṣpa-pulaka-kulam ūcuḥ-bṛhad-vanam asmākam ida bṛhat-tīrthaṃ bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1692: tasmād asmabhyaṃ datta-viśrāntike kṛṣṇāntike sphuṭam uṭajaṃ tava ghaṭayāmaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1693: [78] sovāca-upaśrutir eṣā śruti-veṣā navyāpi na vyabhicaritā /
GK19gp01-11u:1694: yataḥ kṛṣṇāyā iti vivakṣitam api kṛṣṇasyeti lakṣitaṃ karoti /
GK19gp01-11u:1696: mahā-prabhāvavati yasmin jātavati nirdānavatā pṛthivyāṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1699: sakiñcanatā viṣaya-sampattau tad-bhaktau tu niṣkiñcanatā ity ādikaṃ viruddhāyamānam api sarvair anuruddhaṃ kariṣyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1700: tasmād asmākam atra sthātum āgraha eva bhavatām anugrahāya sampannaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1701: [79] atha tāṃ sarve sānandaṃ vandamānās tayā samam indīvara-ruci-nindīhita-kālindīṃ vindamānāḥ parṇa-mandiraṃ pūrṇayantas tatra vāsayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1702: [80] tasminn eva divase' pagata-doṣe pradoṣe samudbhaṭa-kaṃsa-roṣeṇa jāta-citta-śoṣeṇa kṛta-paridevena vasudevena prahitā vraja-hitā baḍavārohiṇī rohiṇī guptam ājagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:1703: yasyām āgatāyāṃ parama-pativratāyāṃ sarva eva vraja-rāja-rāja-samājaḥ śubha-śakuna-saṅkula-śakunādi-samajena samam ullalāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1704: tatra cānanda-mohinyau śrī-yaśodā-rohiṇyau yamunā-gaṅge iva saṅgata-saṅge parasparaṃ parebhyaś ca sukha-samūham ūhatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1705: [81] vraja-rāja-patnī ca tasyā jyaiṣṭham avaṣṭabhya māsa-traya-jātam antarvatnītvaṃ paryālocya svābheda-vedanenaiva śāta-jātaṃ prāpa /
GK19gp01-11u:1706: [82] atha māgha-māsi cāsita-pratipadi kṛta-sarva-sukha-prasara-janyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā vraja-rājaṃ sevyamānā tandrāparatantrāyamāṇā svapna-tulyatā-saṃcitaṃ kiñcid añcitaṃ dadarśa /
GK19gp01-11u:1707: [83] yathā sa eva bālaḥ sarvatas tad-āvaraṇa-kārikayā kayācic divya-kumārikayātmānaṃ pidhāya vraja-rāja-hṛdayān nija-hṛdayaṃ praviśya dṛśyavad eva sthita iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1708: tataś ca so' yaṃ hṛdaya-kamala-madhym adhyāsāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1710: vrajarājaś ca nirantara-svāntara-tat-praveśāveśaṃ durnideśaṃ ciram anubhūya dūyamānatāṃ vidhūya tathaivānubhūtavān /
GK19gp01-11u:1711: [84] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svānte cintayati sma-satyam etad ata eva sad-vāṇī-guṇibhir muhur anayor ātmaja iti matam /
GK19gp01-11u:1712: mayā ca suvicāratas tad eva pūrvaṃ niścitam ācaritam iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1714: [85] madhukaṇṭha uvāca - atha tad ārabhya garbha-lakṣaṇam upalabhya sambhūta-bhavyānāṃ sabhyāṅganā-gaṇānāṃ gokula-kula-pātrī sukha-dātrī babhūva / yathā -
GK19gp01-11u:1715: mukham āpāṇḍu kucāgraṃ sphītaṃ jaṭharaṃ darottuṅgam /
GK19gp01-11u:1718: vraja-rājñyāṃ sphuritātmā kṛṣṇaḥ sphurati sma loke' pi /
GK19gp01-11u:1719: dīpaḥ sphaṭika-ghaṭī-bhāg antar bahir api vibhāti tat-tulyaḥ //JGc_1,3.23//
GK19gp01-11u:1722: spṛhitaṃ kiñcit kiñcid vraja-nṛpa-gṛhiṇī tadā cakre //JGc_1,3.24//
GK19gp01-11u:1726: [86] atha yogamāyā rohiṇyāḥ sāptamāsikaṃ garbhaṃ srastaṃ vidhāya devakyās tad-vidhaṃ taṃ tasyāṃ niyojayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1727: tataś ca labdha-sarva-samaya-sampad-daśe caturdaśe māsi śrāvaṇataḥ prāk śravaṇa-rkṣe samasta-sukha-rohiṇī rohiṇī guṇa-gaṇanayā suṣamaṃ sita-suṣamaṃ sutaṃ susrāva /
GK19gp01-11u:1736: tat tac ca yuktaṃ sa hi divya-bālakaḥ //JGc_1,3.26//
GK19gp01-11u:1737: [87] sa eṣa ca asita-varṣmā sita-varṣmā sad-anujaḥ sūdita-danujaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:1740: svayaṃ rāma-nāmā rāma-ramita-dvivida-vidārayitā ca bhavitā iti jyotirvidbhir udbhāvitam /
GK19gp01-11u:1741: [88] asya jātakarmādikaṃ ca marmagair eva śarmāntanāmabhir guptam eva paryāptam akāri ānaka-dundubhi-mantraṇā-paratantratayā /
GK19gp01-11u:1743: [89] yataḥ sa tu janmata evānuja-janma yāvat jaḍa evādṛśyata /
GK19gp01-11u:1744: tatra pratīkāraś caika evāsīt yathāntardhṛta-nijāvarajaṃ vrajeśvary-aṅkam eva kevalaṃ valamānaḥ samullasitaval lakṣyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1745: [90] tad evaṃ dina-katipaye labdha-vyatyaye garbha-sandarbhāt spaṣṭam aṣṭa-māsi tad-avarajanma-janmanaḥ samārambhaḥ sambhavati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1748: bhādrāntar-bahulāṣṭamīm anu vidhoḥ putre vidhor udgame /
GK19gp01-11u:1749: yoge harṣaṇa-nāmni śuddha-vidhibhe purṇaḥ paraḥ śrī-vidhur
GK19gp01-11u:1750: nandan nanda-vadhū-mude svayam udaid ahnāya dhunvaṃs tamaḥ //JGc_1,3.27//
GK19gp01-11u:1755: vibabhūva vinā satyaṃ dhyānaṃ tretāṃ vinā makhaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1756: vinā dvāparam abhyarcā harer nāma kaliṃ vinā //
GK19gp01-11u:1758: vinā śarad-ambu-śrīḥ śālis tasyāḥ paraṃ vinā //
GK19gp01-11u:1762: vinā sūti-pratītyā ca prasūto' sau yaśodayā //JGc_1,3.29//
GK19gp01-11u:1763: [91] tad idam agre vyaktīkariṣyate / kiṃ ca -
GK19gp01-11u:1769: jātibhiḥ saha mādhavyaḥ ketakyaḥ ketakaiḥ samam /
GK19gp01-11u:1770: kumūdyāny ambujaiḥ sārdhaṃ sphuṭanti smeti dig yadā //
GK19gp01-11u:1772: tadā tad api nāścaryam ācāryaiḥ paricīyate /

GK19gp01-11u:1774: [92] tathā hi etad-uttaraṃ bhāvi-tad-vilokānāṃ lokānāṃ bhāvitānam -
GK19gp01-11u:1775: [93] mukham asya lasita-smitāsita-kamalānām adhipam iva vilokyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1790: kiṃ bahunā, svena mukundam apīti yugapad atra tat-tad-avasara-prasavādīnāṃ tathā durlabha-sannidhīnāṃ nidhīnām api sannipatanaṃ nāsambhāvyam /
GK19gp01-11u:1791: [95] atha tasya janmani ko' pi viśeṣaḥ, yathā -
GK19gp01-11u:1796: [96] atha snigdhakaṇṭhena bhāvitaṃ sa-pramāṇaḥ khalv idam - adṛśyatānujā viṣṇoḥ sāyudhāṣṭa-mahābhujā [BhP 10.4.9] iti śrī-bhāgavatād,
GK19gp01-11u:1797: tac ca nandas tv ātmaja utpanne jātāhlādo mahā-manāḥ [BhP 10.5.1] ity ādiṣv ātmaja-padaiḥ sthāpanā-vyapadeśataḥ sadeśa-rūpam eva nirūpyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1798: kintu tad idam apracchannaṃ vivicya pṛcchāmaḥ yatheha sandehaḥ sarveṣāṃ śāmyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1799: [97] spaṣṭam apy ācaṣṭa - aho ārya tarhi kathaṃ vasudeva-devakī-putratayā so' yam avadhāryate ?
GK19gp01-11u:1800_0: [98] tad īdṛg-vacasi sati snigdhakaṇṭhe vacasi kiñcit-kuṇṭhena madhukaṇṭhena manasi
GK19gp01-11u:1800_1: bhāvitam - śrīmatā devarṣiṇedam āvāṃ praty atiharṣeṇādiṣṭaṃ - yadi kadācic chrīmati
GK19gp01-11u:1800_2: mahā-premavati vraje kṛta-vrajanayoḥ kathā-yogo bhavatoḥ sambhāvyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1801: tadā śrī-kṛṣṇa-devasya sarvato varṣyam aiśvaryaṃ gopanīyam ity ato munivarga-prasiddha-garga-siddhāntam evālambya saṃvadiṣyāvahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1802: sa cāmībhiḥ śruta eveti nāścaryāya paryavasiṣyatīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1803: [99] prakaṭaṃ covāca - atra khalv idam asya śrī-vraja-rāja-tanūjasya rahasyam udbhāvayato mama samatikramaḥ svayam amunaiva bāḍhaṃ soḍhavyaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1804: tathā hi asmin sarvato labdhātirekakā saṃsiddhiḥ khalv ekā vartate /
GK19gp01-11u:1805: yad atikrānta-sarveha-sneha-maya-hṛdaya eva sadā vartamānaḥ snighdatā-digdha-janānāṃ bhāva-mudrayā parokṣaṃ kṛtayāpi svahṛdi pratibimbatatayā mudrito bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1806: asya svarūpeṇāvirbhāvaś ca sneha-maya-sphūrti-pūrti-vaśībhāvata eva sarvathā,
GK19gp01-11u:1808: putratayāvirbhāve ca bījaṃ pitṛ-bhāva-maya-sneha eva nānyeṣām ivānyat /
GK19gp01-11u:1809: jāte ca kutracit putratayāvirbhāve tat-tat-sambandha-maya-sneha-kṛta-caya-sphūrtir eva tathā tathā bhāvenāvirbhāve nibandhanaṃ bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1810_1: bhṛti-bhuk-paryantānāṃ vraja-janānāṃ yeṣām adhimadhyaṃ prati-dviparārdhaṃ pratikalpam āvirbhavati,
GK19gp01-11u:1811: vṛddhi-jīvikānām iva teṣām eva prema-sañcaya-paryudañcana-prapañcam añcaṃs tad-vṛddher aparicchedyatābuddhyā pratidātum adhyavasāyaṃ muñcan sadā putrāditayā sa eṣa virājate,
GK19gp01-11u:1812: nānye tu tatra kila tilam apy avakāśa-kālaṃ labhante /
GK19gp01-11u:1813: [101] etad evoktaṃ brahmaṇā eṣāṃ ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kiṃ deva rāteti naḥ [BhP 10.14.35] ity ādinā /
GK19gp01-11u:1814: etad eva ca śrī-nārāyaṇa-devena samādiṣṭaṃ - yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ ity ādinā / tataś ca -
GK19gp01-11u:1817_1: śrīmad-vraja-mahendreṇa mahīyamānasya yasya mahābhagavato yā yogamāyākhyā durghaṭa-ghañanī
GK19gp01-11u:1818: tena kila dattā sā tvat-putre śrī-kṛṣṇa eva paryavasyati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1819: sā ceha svajana-sneha-nikṣipta-cittasya yadyapy asya tat-putrasya prāyo' vadhānaṃ na prāpnoti /
GK19gp01-11u:1820: tathāpi tasmād anyasmāc ca parokṣam anukṣaṇam anugatiṃ līlā-sahāyakaṃ ca prapañcati /
GK19gp01-11u:1821: yathā ca yogamāyā tathā tad-anugatā māyādayo' pīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1822: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi tvat-prabhu-pratta-śaktim enaṃ tvam eva nija-śrī-prabhṛti-śaktibhir gopāyasveti gargo vyañjitavān /
GK19gp01-11u:1823: tad evaṃ sati bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te [BhP 10.8.15] ity api tad-uktir udriktīsyāt /
GK19gp01-11u:1825_1: anumodamānasya tad-bhāva-rūpānurūpaṃ rūpaṃ yadṛcchāvaśād ekadhānekadhā ca samīpator'samīpato'
GK19gp01-11u:1826: [102] tataḥ śrī-vasudeva-devakyor antar yac caturbhujam asya rūpaṃ sphurati,
GK19gp01-11u:1827: tad eva hi bahir āvirbhavati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1829: tenaiva ca nyāyena śrī-vrajeśvaryos tu paraṃ dvibhuja-mūrtitayā sphūrtir āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:1830: tataḥ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti dhṛta-tapo-vargasya gargasya vacanam anusṛtya parāmṛśyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1832: tadā tasya yad apūrvaṃ dvibhuja-rūpaṃ pūrvaṃ māyayā saha śrī-yaśodāyāḥ svāntaram āyātaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:1833: tad eva tatra sannidhānam avāpya caturbhujaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya svayam āvirbabhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:1834: yatra sākāratayā mātṛ-garbha-sthitāpi māyā nirākāratayā tūrdhva-gatyā tanvā tad-vāhanatām āgatā /
GK19gp01-11u:1835: gandavāha-śreṇī nīla-kamala-dalam iva tatra sarvālakṣitatayā tat prāpitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:1836: yā khalu pūrvaṃ tad-ākarṣeṇa dharṣeṇa paraṃ mātaram api mohena mlāpitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:1837: [103] atha punas tena garbhasthenākāreṇa mātuḥ prasūti-bhramaṃ ca samprathayya bahir ātmanaṃ saṃvalayya prasūti-śayyām evādhiśayya sthitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:1838: yā khalu śrī-devakītaḥ śrī-rohiṇyāṃ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṅkramaṇe' pi tathā prakramate sma iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1839_0: [104] atra ca snigdhakaṇṭhenāntaś cintitam - satyam evāha sma nūnaṃ athāham aṃśabhāgena
GK19gp01-11u:1839_1: [BhP 10.29] iti hi māyāṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyam ādiṣṭā prabhuṇāṃśena kāryārthe
GK19gp01-11u:1839_2: sambhaviṣyati [BhP 10.1.25] iti ca devān prati brahma-vacanam /
GK19gp01-11u:1841: kāryārthe tat-tan-mohanāya aṃśena sambhaviṣyati śrī-kṛṣṇasya dvibhuja-rūpeṇākāra-bhedena saha miliṣyati seti brahmaṇo' bhiprāyaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1842: tad evam eva hi vyākhyātam anyatra śrī-bhāgavata-tattvavidbhiḥ avatīrṇau jagaty-arthe svāṃśena bala-keśavau [BhP 10.38.32] ity atra svāṃśena mūrti-bhedeneti /

GK19gp01-11u:3729: [42] baddhvā ca mātā śikṣāṃ ghaṭayantī nija-kaṭhinatām eva tasmin haṭhini prakaṭayantī tābhir vihasantībhiḥ saha sa-narma-geha-karmaṇe gacchantī,
GK19gp01-11u:3732: [43] tataś ca gatāsu tāsu kṣaṇaṃ kṛta-rodana-vinodaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3733_0: paścād bahala-khalaṃ praty udūkhala-nodanāya labdha-modaḥ sa tu baddha eva kevala-bāla-valitatayā
GK19gp01-11u:3733_1: prabalita-cāpala-śraddhas taiḥ saha prahasan khelann ulūkhalam etaṃ laghu laghu cālayām āsa,
GK19gp01-11u:3734: hārayāmāsa ca tair evolbaṇa-hāsatayā śulva-hāriṇīnāṃ labdha-śūnya-sādharmya-harmya-śreṇyā hāri-śikyita-nava-nava-nītādikam āhārayāmāsa ca /
GK19gp01-11u:3735: kintu, tat-karṣaṇa-maya-harṣa-prada-līlayā na ca kareṇa na cāpareṇa tad-uddāna-mocana-rocanatām avāpa /
GK19gp01-11u:3736: [44] tatra tu pura-dvāra-purastād-varti vātāvarta-vartita-nartanam iva yamalam arjuna-dvayam asya netra-vartmani vartate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3737: krameṇa cāsau tayor antara eva vikramate sma iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3738_0: [45] etāvan mukta-kaṇṭham uṭṭaṅkayan snigdhakaṇṭhas tad-bhañjane kāraṇaṃ harer aiśvarya-pracāraṇam
GK19gp01-11u:3738_1: iti tat pratārayan kāraṇāntaram eva vyājahāra- [46] tataḥ sphuṭaṃ jhaṭiti parataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3739: tad-adhvanas tu saṅkṣiptatayādhaḥ-kṣiptatayā tad udūkhalaṃ pratitaṣṭambhe /
GK19gp01-11u:3740: [47] atha sphuṭam asau vaṭītroṭanecchayā tat kṛṣṭavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3753: [49] atha tayor atyūrjitena visphūrjitena muhūrtārdham ārtatayā goṣṭhādhiṣṭhānā mūrcchām ṛcchantaḥ sthitāḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3755: sā tu tal-līlā-mādhurī-dhurīṇatayā citrākṛtir iva mitrāvalī na vitrāsam āsasāda /
GK19gp01-11u:3756: [50] dūrād api tad-ūrjitaṃ visphūrjitaṃ sambhrama-kāry avadhārya tu vraja-pati-mukhās tarkita-mukhās tad evābhipratasthire /
GK19gp01-11u:3758: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GK19gp01-11u:3759: vinā hasti-kṛtaṃ doṣaṃ kenemau pātitau drumau? //JGc_1,8.37// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3761: tasmāt tasmān mahā-garjān mūrcchām ārcchan vraje janāḥ //JGc_1,8.38// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3763: [51] avadadhire ca tan-nikaṭa-taṭasthaṃ bhāsamāna-hāsa-vilāsa-mukham ulūkhalaṃ karṣantaṃ līlā-sukhaṃ varṣantaṃ bāla-gopālam /
GK19gp01-11u:3767: [53] pitā cāntaḥ-sambhrāntaḥ sann api tasya sāntvanāya mukha-mātraṃ hasita-pātram ācarann acirād eva taṃ vipāśayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3768: [54] sa-rodana-vadanaṃ vadanaṃ cumban vidann api muhuḥ papraccha ca,
GK19gp01-11u:3770: kutratyaḥ sa khalu khala-buddhir yena colūkhale nirbandha-janita-baddhas tvam asi? iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3771: [55] sa tu pitari rataś cirataḥ śliṣṭa-kaṇṭhatayābhyarṇam āgataḥ karṇe varṇayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:3774: [56] pitā tu tāṃ pūrvaṃ vigata-saṃvedatayā anantaraṃ tu svata eva jāta-nirvedatayā dūnāṃ veda sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3775: tata eva na sahasā rahasāpi paribhāṣitum iyeṣa /
GK19gp01-11u:3779: sphuṭam anena kṛta-madhya-gamanena vistīrṇa-khale pura-sthale krīḍituṃ niṣkramya,
GK19gp01-11u:3780: vikṛṣṭa-tale tiryag-bhāvād acale cāsminn ulūkhale khaṭat-khaṭiti truṭitatām ṛcchat kuṭha-dvayaṃ jhaṭiti luṭhad-bhāvam ānarccha /
GK19gp01-11u:3781: [58] tataś ca khaṇḍitābhyām ābhyāṃ nirgatya kaṭaka-mukuṭa-kuṇḍalādi-maṇḍitau rociṣmad-vapuṣmantau śuṣmāṇau praṇamantau samantād etaṃ kim api santoṣayāmāsatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3784: bālānāṃ pralāpo' yam iti vatsalāḥ kalayāmbabhūvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3786_0: [60] tataś ca kramād eka-dvy-ādi-prakramān militena vraja-janena samaṃ vraja-bhūpālaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3786_1: sva-bālakenāṅkaṃ sad alaṅkṛtya nitya-kṛtya-kṛte kālindīm anuvindamānas tenānuṣajya
GK19gp01-11u:3790: [61] taj-jāyā tu taj-jābhyāṃ duḥkha-lajjābhyāṃ sajjatī gṛhād āgrahāc ca na niṣkrāntavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3794: [62] śrī-vraja-rājas tv avarātmajaṃ rāmam api samānīya tena sutena ca sārdhaṃ tayoḥ snigdha-kala-kolāhala-nidigdhaḥ sagdhim ācaritavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3795: tābhyāṃ mūrta-paramānanda-pūrtābhyāṃ muhūrtam ekaṃ viśramya ca samyag-īdṛg-auśīra-sukha-dhīra-cetā gavāgamana-ramya-samaye gosthānam āgamya go-dohanādi-kāryaṃ ca kārayati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3796: [63] udavasitād atisitāṃ sitām ānāyya tayā sahitaṃ suhitaṃ saha sa-vayobhis tanayau stana-pāna-pratinidhitayā dhāroṣṇaṃ payaḥ pāyayāmāsa ca /
GK19gp01-11u:3798: [64] atha punar api harmyam āgamya tābhyām ācarita-sāyam-bhojana-sukha-samāje vraja-rāje,
GK19gp01-11u:3799: saha-rohiṇīkās tadīya-santata-sukhābhīkāḥ svakula-māṇikya-lakṣmyaḥ sarvāḥ prāmāṇikyaḥ samāsādya nivedavatyaḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:3802: tām anu sarvāś ca tathā vartante /
GK19gp01-11u:3804: roṣam anuvartamānā svayam eva sva-doṣaṃ paśyatu /
GK19gp01-11u:3807: sā khalv antar bahir apy atikomalā tavedṛśā-lāpena tāpenātimlāsyati /
GK19gp01-11u:3811: kintu tvām eva samayā samayān gamayiṣyāmi /
GK19gp01-11u:3812: [70] atha rāja-jyāyaḥ-prajāvatyaḥ sahāsam ūcuḥ-stanaṃ kasya pāsyasi?
GK19gp01-11u:3818: [75] kṛṣṇaḥ sa-roṣāsram uvāca-māṃ vihāyeyam apīyāya iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3819: [76] tad etad ākarṇya sāsrā rohiṇī nīcair uvāca-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3822: [77] kṛṣṇas tad etad aśrṇvann iva sāsraṃ pitṛ-mukham īkṣate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3823: rohiṇī tu saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tasya saṅkarṣaṇāya sañjñayā jñāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3824: tena gṛhīta-hastaḥ punar asau nirasta-tad-dhastatayā vidrutya pitur utsaṅga-saṅgī babhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:3825: tathābhavaṃś ca bhujābhyām avaguṇṭhita-tat-kaṇṭhaḥ kṛta-bāṣpa-vṛṣṭiṃ tad-dṛṣṭim eva paśyaṃs tam atīva vaśyam ācarann āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:3826: [78] vraja-rājas tu mātary antaḥ-sneham asya paryālocya tad abhivyaktaye hastaṃ kiñcid udastaṃ vidhāyābhidadhe-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3829: kṛṣṇas tu tad asahamānas tasya hastaṃ stambhayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3830: [79] tato vraja-rājaḥ punar vihasya nija-vatsalatayātīva sadayaṃ tadīya-mātur api hṛdayam adhiyan-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3833: ity anadhātor viruddhārthaṃ prayujya sa-parihāsam āha sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3834: [80] kṛṣṇas tu bālaka-bhāvenājasraṃ mātari sa-tṛṣṇaḥ sāsraṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:3836: tatra gamyatām iti sa-śaṅkaṃ rohiṇy-aṅkaṃ gatavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3837: [81] tataś ca, prahasita-kalakaleṣu sakaleṣu parama-sukhārohiṇyā rohiṇyānītaḥ so' pi veśma praviśya sa-rodana-modam ambālā-galaṃ lagnavān / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:3842: [82] atha tāsāṃ tv aneka-sāntvanayā labdha-śāntiḥ kiñcid vyañjita-mukha-kāntiḥ śrī-sumukha-kanyeyaṃ stanyena tanayaṃ prīṇayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3843: bubhuje ca sahāgrajātena tena parama-hitābhiḥ sahitā /
GK19gp01-11u:3844: [83] tad ārabhya tu saṅkocaṃ upalabhya vrajarāja-locana-gocaratāṃ vāsara-trayaṃ nāsāditavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:3845: dināntare tu pitṛ-nideśa-pāla-bāla-gopālenaiva celāñcale gṛhītvā nītā /
GK19gp01-11u:3846: tad-dinaś ca sa-narmāmodaṃ dāmodaraḥ iti vraja-vadhūbhir āhūyate sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3852: [84] so' yam asyā bādarāyaṇinā ghaṭita-samyag-udghaṭṭanaḥ śrīmān yaśaḥ-paṭaha-śabdas trailokyam eva ślokyatayā paryaṭann asti /
GK19gp01-11u:3854: [85] śrī-rāmas tu nijānujaṃ sa-tṛṣṇam āha sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3863: yau vṛkṣāv api tau svasya divya-bhaktau vinirmame //JGc_1,8.41// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3864: [88] tad evaṃ vṛtte vṛtte sarve tat-tat-kathāṃ api tat-tat-parvaivānubhūya svaṃ svam āvāsam āsannavantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3873: [1] atha dināntare bhāsamānāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ śrī-vrajarājaḥ paryanuyuktavān,
GK19gp01-11u:3875: tau khalu vṛkṣau vraje saṅkalpa-pradatayā devatā-sadṛkṣau /
GK19gp01-11u:3879: [2] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-pūrvaṃ dhūrjaṭi-mitrād utpannavantau śrī-devarṣi-varye dhārṣṭyam anuṣṭhitavantau santau,
GK19gp01-11u:3880: pariṇāmataḥ paramānugraheṇa śrī-devarṣi-varya-kṛta-nigraheṇa vṛkṣatāyām api bhavagad-bhaktatām āgatavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3881: pratibhavad-avatāram udbhavatas tasya bṛhadvana-stha-bhavad-gṛhasya tu sadeśe deśe yamalārjuna-veśena sthitavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3882: etad-anantaraṃ ca nija-gatim āgatavantau parama-bhagavad-bhaktimantau ca jātavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3883: samprati tu tad-bhakti-phala-vyaktim apy ākalayantau vartete /
GK19gp01-11u:3886: [4] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sva-mukha-kamalaṃ namayitvā tuṣṇīm iva sthitvā ca madhukaṇṭhaṃ kaṭākṣeṇekṣāñcakre /
GK19gp01-11u:3887: [5] vrajarāja uvāca-saṅkucann iva kathaṃ nocitavān asi?
GK19gp01-11u:3891: [7] vrajarājaḥ sasmitam uvāca-satyaṃ bhavad-uktaṃ punar-uktam eva bhavet,
GK19gp01-11u:3892: yato bhavato maunam evātra bravītīti rīti-vaśāj jñātavanta eva ca vayam /
GK19gp01-11u:3893: tathāpi, sva-mukhena sukhena yojayatu bhavān asmān /
GK19gp01-11u:3894: [8] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-sarva-sukha-varṣi-śrī-devarṣi-caraṇānāṃ kṛpaṇa-viṣaya-kṛpā-kpta-tad-etad-gatī labdhamatī tāv eva sphuṭam āvām iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3895: [9] tad etad ākarṇya nirvarṇita-tan-mukhāḥ śrī-vrajarāja-pramukhāḥ samāhūya bhūyaḥ sa-kautukaṃ sa-sukhaṃ tau militavantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3897: [10] punas tu tat-praśnānantaraṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ krama-prāptāṃ kathāṃ prāha,
GK19gp01-11u:3898: [11] tad evaṃ vicitrāt pūrva-caritrād divasa-pañcakānantaraṃ śrīmān upanandaḥ sva-mandiraṃ vindamānaḥ sva-patnīṃ papraccha,
GK19gp01-11u:3899: adya sva-devara-nara-deva-gṛhe kiṃ gamana-maṅgalaṃ jagṛhe bhavatyā?
GK19gp01-11u:3901: ko vā tad gamanaṃ vinā mano mānayituṃ śaknoti,
GK19gp01-11u:3905: yasmin prema-pracuraṃ bhayam api tasmin vibhāvyate pracuram /
GK19gp01-11u:3906: yadvan netraṃ śaṅkā-viṣayas tadvan na karṇādi //JGc_1,9.1// [gīti]
GK19gp01-11u:3907: [15] tathā hi, yadyapi niravadyādhāna-vidhātṛ-mātṛ-prabhṛtibhī rakṣyete sabhībhir eva tau,
GK19gp01-11u:3908: tathāpi khela-velāyāṃ sambhālayitum apāraṇīyatayā sukalam eva vikalayataḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3910_1: yaśodāyāṃ tadīya-sāhāyakā-rohiṇyām api rohiṇyām āśaṅkā-pātrīr dhātrīr vañcayitvā
GK19gp01-11u:3911: dhātrīṇām aparatra karmaṇi manāg dattātmanām agrataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3912: savyāsavya-dṛśor dṛśor aviṣaye sāntarddhi-deśe ca tau /
GK19gp01-11u:3915_0: [17] atha tathā nikṛtas tat-pālanādhikṛta-dhātrī-vargaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtāvadhāna-sargaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3915_1: śīghram eva kṛtānumārgaḥ krameṇa svasyākāraṇam akāraṇatām āsāditam avadhārya nijeśvaryor āvedayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3916: [18] tāvac ca tato' py atidūraṃ gambhīra-sarit-tīraṃ gatāv ākarṇya pūtanā-sūdana-prasū rāmāmbālām eva tayoḥ saṅkalanāya cālayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3917: æhanta, na jāne khalv arjuna-yugalavad durjana-preryamāṇatayā kaścid anokaho vā nadyavaroho vā skhalatīti mayi pāka-karma-vipākāvaruddhāyāṃ satvaraṃ tvam eva svayaṃ yāhi' iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3918: sā ca tatra gatā śīghraṃ vyagrī-bhūtāṅga-mānasā /
GK19gp01-11u:3920: [19] tataś ca krīḍā-raṅgākulatayā tad anaṅgīkartari saṅgīśitari kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāgraje ca tad-anuga-tṛṣṇe,
GK19gp01-11u:3921: sā parivṛtya sadmāgatya tasya kiñcid bhaya-sthānaṃ prabhava-sthānam eva prasthāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3924: vīkṣya stana-miṣāt snehaṃ varṣantī hūtim ātanot //JGc_1,9.4// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3925: [21] na tu sahasā samīpam āpa tat-palāyana-śaṅkayā /
GK19gp01-11u:3931: [22] tathāpi mithaḥ saṅgharṣayataḥ krīḍā-tarṣavantaṃ tam anāgacchantaṃ dharṣayantī,
GK19gp01-11u:3932: vicchiduratā-vidhur asajātīya-snehasya dvitīya-pātram ādṛta-sva-vacana-mātratayāvaśyam eva vaśyaṃ śrī-bala-bhadram eva sānukrośaṃ cukrośa-
GK19gp01-11u:3934: prātar eva kṛtāhāraḥ krīḍāśrānto' pi putraka //
GK19gp01-11u:3938: [23] tato mātṛ-harṣaṇāya nivartayituṃ kṛṣṇaṃ karṣati saṅkarṣaṇe,
GK19gp01-11u:3941: janmarkṣaṃ te' dya bhavati viprebhyo dehi gāḥ śuciḥ //[BhP 10.11.18]
GK19gp01-11u:3942: [24] punas tadānīm eva gṛhād āgatān bālān ākalayya spṛhāṃ bṛṃhayantī babhāṣe,
GK19gp01-11u:3944: tvaṃ ca snātaḥ kṛtāhāro viharasva svalaṅkṛtaḥ //[BhP 10.11.19]
GK19gp01-11u:3945_0: [25] tad evaṃ bālyam evārabhya vipra-poṣaṇād ātmanas toṣa iti tad ārambhāya stambhamānam
GK19gp01-11u:3945_1: āhvānādi-lakṣyeṇa laghu laghu samīpam āsannā sa-rāmaṃ rāmānujaṃ bhujayor gṛhītvā gṛham ānināya /
GK19gp01-11u:3946: [26] tataś ca, janmarkṣaṃ te iti mithyā-kathyamānam api tena gṛhītaṃ nitarām eva gṛhītavatī vrajarāja-gṛhiṇī tat parva,
GK19gp01-11u:3947: yatra duṣṭa-dṛṣṭi-nivāraṇāya sa-yantrā mantrā muhur vinyāsam ūhuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3948: [27] tad evam avadhāya sa sarva-darśaḥ śrīmān upanandaḥ parāmamarśa,
GK19gp01-11u:3949: satyam āśaṅkitaṃ prajāṃ prati prajāvatyor anayoḥ prajāvatyoḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3950: yad idaṃ goṣṭha-prakoṣṭham avaduṣṭam iva dṛśyate /
GK19gp01-11u:3952: [28] tatpatnī prāha-vicāraḥ punas tatrabhavaty eva sthāsyate /
GK19gp01-11u:3953: [29] atha prātar eva go-vraja-vrajānta-sthāyāṃ sarvāsthāspada-vrajarāja-samāja-rājamānāyām āsthānyāṃ militā gopālā gopāla-nādi-saukaryaṃ nātreti paryālocayāmāsuḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:3955_0: tatra tu vayo-jñānābhyāṃ vṛddhaḥ śrī-rāma-kṛṣṇa-premṇā samṛddhaḥ svāṅka-palyaṅkaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3955_1: sad-alaṅkariṣṇunā madhye madhye ca cibukaṃ gṛhītvā vitatha-praśnam ācariṣṇunā tat
GK19gp01-11u:3955_2: tadā krīḍanaka-yācñā-satṛṣṇena kṛṣṇena labhyamānānandaḥ śrīmān upanandaḥ prāvocad akhila-rocanam /
GK19gp01-11u:3956: iha ca vrajarājasya saṅkocam avalocayan bāla-prajā-mātrasya hita-pakṣam upalakṣayāmāsa / yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:3957: æiha na stheyam' itītthaṃ vraja-hitam uktaṃ bhavadbhir yat /
GK19gp01-11u:3958: tat punar atibālānāṃ hita-pradhānaṃ mama sphurati //JGc_1,9.5// [upagīti]

GK19gp01-11u:4741: tadāñjali-bandha-vyañjitāṃ sañjñām anu samanujñāṃ yācamānaṃ viriñciṃ khalv evaṃ lambhita-tad-upālambha-narma-smitam anujñāpayāmāsa-yadi tatra-bhavatām ājñā vijñāyate,
GK19gp01-11u:4742: tadā tān pūrvam evānusaṃhitān sannihitān ānayāmi iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4743: [47] tataś ca viriñciḥ kiñcin namra-niṭilatā-ghaṭita-muni-vrata-sunirūpita-nija-durnītitayānujñāyāḥ karma-kartṛtvaṃ vyaktīkurvan,
GK19gp01-11u:4744: bhakti-bharāsakti-pṛktīkṛta-pulaka-saṅkulatayā svāparādha-maya-bādhā-vyakulatayā ca triḥ parikramya bahuśaḥ praṇamya ca nija-harmyam eva jagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:4745_0: [48] śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca manasi tasyāparādhaṃ manāg apy anāgamayann āgamayamānaḥ prāg-diṣṭa-sadiṣṭa-dveṣa-veśa-kriyānatikrami-kramatayāvasthitāṃs
GK19gp01-11u:4746: [49] tathaiva hi teṣāṃ kāla-deśa-viparyayā paryālocanāya druhiṇa-devena sneha-dehany anavadya-vidyeyam udbhāvitā /
GK19gp01-11u:4749: vatsān pulinam āninye yathā pūrva-sakhaṃ svakam //[BhP 10.14.42] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4756: darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam //[BhP 10.14.45-46] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4757: [51] carma cedam etāvantaṃ samayaṃ yathāvad eva yogamāyayāntardhāpitam iti gamyam /
GK19gp01-11u:4758: [52] tataś ca saṃvatsara-prasara-vatsa-vatsapāla-bāla-viraha-virahān mahatānandena mahitas tair eva sahitaḥ saṃhita-sampad-vrajaṃ vrajaṃ praviśan,
GK19gp01-11u:4760: pūrva-pūrvato' py apūrvaṃ parva parvati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:4766: [53] tataś ca pitṛ-sambandhibhir nanda-sūnur iti mātṛ-sambandhibhir yaśodā-sūnur iti tasya nāmānūdya,
GK19gp01-11u:4767: sadya eva siddham iti cirantanam api tac-caritaṃ jage / tad yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4790: [54] iti śrutvā ca te vrajasthāś cintayāmāsuḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4791: sādhu-ghātukānāṃ pātukānām āmīṣāṃ katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ? iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4793_0: sukhānubiddhe teṣāṃ same samāgame prātas tu bṛhad-bhrātaram anugamya praṇaya-maya-ramya-roṣam
GK19gp01-11u:4793_1: anunīya dīyamāna-vismayatayā tān ānīya tena caikatra praṇīya śrīvatsa-vatsaḥ pūrvavad
GK19gp01-11u:4794: [56] atha punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ samāpanāya sa-vismayam ivāha sma-
GK19gp01-11u:4797_0: [57] tad evaṃ kathakayoḥ kathāṃ prathayitvā sabhyeṣu sākṣād iva kalita-tat-tat-keli-sandhayoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4797_1: kṛtāñjali-bandhayos tad-dine' pi pūrvavad eva sarve gṛha-vartmani vartamānā nija-nija-spṛhaṇīyaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4797_2: karma nirmimāṇā api tām eva līlāṃ bṛṃhitāṃ hṛdi jagṛhire /
